segments.text: The camera occasionally zooms in to focus on
close-ups, medium shots, and long shots
The scene transitions seamlessly, showcasing different angles and perspectives of the interchange,

critique:
1. After the transition, regarding the overpass scene, the camera moves backward and rightward while panning left. There is no instance of the camera zooming in to focus on specific areas of congestion or notable vehicle movements, nor does it pull back for a broader view of the entire system.

2. There are no close-up shots — only wide and extreme wide shots are present.

3. There is no tracking movement in the video.

4. The perspective changes through cuts, but this was not mentioned.
